fields.name: capStartEdge
fields.desc: Whether to use the default use rounded corners and margin on the start side.

fields.name: capEndEdge
fields.desc: Whether to use the default use rounded corners and margin on the end side.

fields.name: background
fields.desc: The color to fill in the background of the [CupertinoPickerDefaultSelectionOverlay]. It Support for use [CupertinoDynamicColor].
